songs.title: Dah Dee Dah (Sexy Thing)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, yeah yeah
Say yeah yeah, yeah yeah yeah
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah

[Verse 1]
Sexy thing, I can do anything
'Cause constantly (constantly)
I'm thinking of how to get you next to me (next to me)
Maybe it's there, playing your mentality (ohh) ooh

[Chorus]
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
(I can't explain...)
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
(...why I feel this way)
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
(I don't know, loving you)

[Verse 2]
Sexy thing (yeah yeah)
You can't hide the feelings that are deep inside (deep inside)
I can see it pouring through them pretty eyes (pretty eyes)
How much longer can you hide it, this disguise? (not much)

[Bridge]
Oh, you're givin' this feelin' (this feelin')
That got me yearnin' (that got me yearnin')
I hope you know I'm what you need
(I'm what you need, I'm what you need)
Just le tme tell ya (let me tell ya)
There's no one for ya
There's no one for ya but me
No, no

[Chorus]
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
(Make me sing)
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
(Mmm, I can't explain...)
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
(Oh, why I feel this way)
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
(When I'm loving you)

[Outro]
If you want to go, we can run
We can run away from here
I got this feelin', baby
If you want to go, we can run
We can run away from here

Dah dee ya dah dah, dah dee ya dah dah
Dah dee ya dah dah, dah dee ya dah dah
Too high, too high, yes, I am
Too high, too high, hey hey
Too high, too high, yes, I am
Too high, too high

'Cause you make me wanna sing, baby
Hey, bah-di-yah-dah-dah
Make me wanna sing, yeah
Somethin' like, somethin' like
Ba-ba-di-ya-ba-ba, ba-di-ya-dah-dah
Somethin' like, somethin' like
Ba-di-ya-dah-dah, ba-di-ya-dah-dah

Let it ride, let it ride
Let it ride, let it ride
Hit, hit me off again
Dah dee dah, dah dah dah dee dah
